todolist.ui.controllers

Class SettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • todolist.ui.controllers.MainViewController
      • todolist.ui.controllers.SettingsController

  • public class SettingsController
extends MainViewController
    SettingsController controls and manipulates data for display on the main display area.
    Author:
    Huang Lie Jun (A0123994W)
    See Also:
    MainViewController
